alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler, St. Johns, eastern Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Andalusia, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka and Andalusia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
